description: This is a C++ header file defining the IUserSettings interface in the WPEFramework, which manages user settings such as audio description, language preferences, captions, closed captioning, and privacy mode. It includes notification mechanisms for setting changes and methods to get and set various user preferences.

classes.name: IUserSettings
classes.description: Interface for managing and notifying changes in user settings such as audio description, language preferences, captions, closed captions, and privacy policies.

classes.name: IUserSettings::INotification
classes.description: Notification interface for receiving events when user settings change, e.g., changes in audio description, language, captions, closed caption service, and privacy mode.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback to receive user settings change events.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification callback.

methods.name: GetAudioDescription
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the audio description setting.

methods.name: SetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Sets the preferred list of audio languages in ISO 639-2/B codes.

methods.name: GetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves the current preferred audio languages.

methods.name: SetPresentationLanguage
methods.description: Sets the presentation language using a BCP 47 code.

methods.name: GetPreferredCaptionsLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves the current preferred captions languages.

methods.name: SetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Sets the preferred closed captioning service.

methods.name: GetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Retrieves the current preferred closed captioning service.

methods.name: SetPrivacyMode
methods.description: Sets the privacy mode, e.g., share or do not share.

methods.name: GetPrivacyMode
methods.description: Retrieves the current privacy mode setting.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
